Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" context in the context viewer and select "Delete" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Delete" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "OK"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" dialog box is being hidden. The "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" context has been removed from the context view. The context is still available on disk in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Delete an administrator context from both workspace and disk

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" context in the context viewer and select "Delete" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Delete" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "delete context on disk" checkbox at the bottom of the dialog box
Click on the "OK" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" dialog box disappears. The "DeleteAsAnAdministrator" context has been removed from the context view. The context is no longer available on disk in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "DeleteAsAUser" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "DeleteAsAUser" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In user mode, create one participation to context "DeleteAsAUser" called "Participation to DeleteAsAUser"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to DeleteAsAUser" user context is displayed within the context viewer of the user

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Right click on the "Participation to DeleteAsAUser" context in the context viewer and select "Delete" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Delete" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Yes" to confirm deletion

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" dialog box disappears. The "Participation to DeleteAsAUser" context has been removed from the context view.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContextDeletionTest" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContextDeletionTest" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Orchestra" category of the "AdminContextDeletionTest" context and fill both ArtefactPath and ConfigurationDirectories variables with valid values
In user mode, create one participation to context "AdminContextDeletionTest" called "UserContextDeletionTest"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "UserContextDeletionTest" user context is displayed within the context viewer of the user

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Right click on "UserContextDeletionTest" in the context viewer and select "Set as current context" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A popup window with a progress bar is displayed and disappears when completed. The "UserContextDeletionTest" context is displayed in bold within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "UserContextDeletionTest" context in the context viewer and select "Delete" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error window pops up displaying an error message: "Unable to delete current content (or parent of user context) !"

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Cannot delete a parent context of a current user context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContextDeletionTest" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContextDeletionTest" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Orchestra" category of the "AdminContextDeletionTest" context and fill both ArtefactPath and ConfigurationDirectories variables with valid values
In user mode, create one participation to context "AdminContextDeletionTest" called "UserContextDeletionTest"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "UserContextDeletionTest" user context is displayed within the context viewer of the user

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Right click on "UserContextDeletionTest" in the context viewer and select "Set as current context" int the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A popup window with a progress bar is displayed and disappears when completed. The "UserContextDeletionTest" context is displayed in bold within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Right click on the "AdminContextDeletionTest" context in the context viewer and select "Delete" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error window pops up displaying an error message: "Unable to delete current content (or parent of user context) !"

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Delete a user context both in the workspace and on disk

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "DeleteAsAUser" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "DeleteAsAUser" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In user mode, create one participation to context "DeleteAsAUser" called "Participation to DeleteAsAUser"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to DeleteAsAUser" user context is displayed within the context viewer of the user

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Right click on the "Participation to DeleteAsAUser" context in the context viewer and select "Delete" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Delete" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "delete contenxt on disk" checkbox at the bottom of the dialog box
Click on "Yes" to confirm deletion

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" dialog box disappears. The "Participation to DeleteAsAUser" context has been removed from the context view. The D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator\DeleteAsUser\users directory is empty
